member.summary: Registers a new user with the provided registration details.
member.remarks: This method processes the registration request by sending a to the mediator. The result includes authentication information for the registered user.
member.param: The registration details, including the username, email, and password.

member.name: M:Million.RealEstate.Backend.Api.Controllers.PropertiesController.Create(Million.RealEstate.Backend.Api.Models.CreatePropertyRequest)
member.summary: Creates a new property and returns its unique identifier.
member.remarks: This method processes the provided to create a new property record. The property details are encapsulated in a object. The method returns a 201 Created response with the location of the newly created resource.
member.param: The request containing the details of the property to create, including name, address, price, internal code, year, and owner ID.
member.returns: An containing the unique identifier of the newly created property.

member.name: M:Million.RealEstate.Backend.Api.Controllers.PropertiesController.GetById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a property by its unique identifier.
member.remarks: This method queries the list of properties and returns the first property that matches the specified identifier.
member.param: The unique identifier of the property to retrieve. Must be a positive integer.
member.returns: An containing the property details as a if found; otherwise, a if no property with the specified identifier exists.

member.summary: Updates the price of a property with the specified identifier.
member.remarks: The must correspond to an existing property. The must contain a valid price value.
member.param: The unique identifier of the property whose price is to be updated.
An object containing the new price for the property.
member.returns: A representing the asynchronous operation. Returns if the operation is successful.

member.name: M:Million.RealEstate.Backend.Api.Controllers.PropertiesController.AddImage(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Adds an image to the property with the specified identifier.
member.remarks: The image is associated with the property identified by . Ensure that the provided is a valid base64-encoded string.
member.param: The unique identifier of the property to which the image will be added.
The image file content as a base64-encoded string.
member.returns: A representing the unique identifier of the newly added image.

member.name: M:Million.RealEstate.Backend.Api.Controllers.PropertiesController.GetWithFilters(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Decimal},System.Nullable{System.Decimal},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Retrieves a collection of properties that match the specified filter criteria.
member.remarks: All filter parameters are optional. If no filters are provided, the method returns all available properties.
member.param: The name or partial name of the property to filter by. This parameter is optional.
The minimum price of the properties to include in the results. This parameter is optional.
The maximum price of the properties to include in the results. This parameter is optional.
The year associated with the properties to filter by. This parameter is optional.
The unique identifier of the property owner to filter by. This parameter is optional.
member.returns: An containing an of objects that match the specified filter criteria. If no properties match the criteria, an empty collection is returned.

member.name: M:Million.RealEstate.Backend.Api.Controllers.PropertiesController.Update(System.Int32,Million.RealEstate.Backend.Api.Models.UpdatePropertyRequest)
member.summary: Updates the property with the specified identifier using the provided update request data.
member.param: The unique identifier of the property to update. Must be a positive integer.
The data used to update the property. This must include the property's name, address, year, and owner ID.
member.returns: A indicating that the update operation completed successfully.

member.name: M:Million.RealEstate.Backend.Api.Controllers.PropertiesController.AddTrace(System.Int32,Million.RealEstate.Backend.Api.Models.AddPropertyTraceRequest)
member.summary: Adds a new property trace for the specified property.
member.remarks: This method processes the provided trace details and associates them with the specified property. The must correspond to an existing property.
member.param: The unique identifier of the property to which the trace will be added.
The details of the property trace to add, including the date of sale, name, value, and tax.
